desc: A horizontal triband of red, black (double width) and green;
charged with a white crescent and five-pointed star centred on the black stripe.

libya-jamahiriya.title: Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya
libya-jamahiriya.subtitle: Gaddafi regime

desc: The Emirate of Cyrenaica (Arabic: إمارة برقة‎) came into existence when Sayyid Idris
unilaterally proclaimed Cyrenaica an independent Senussi emirate on 1 March 1949,
backed by the United Kingdom. Sayyid Idris proclaimed himself Emir of Cyrenaica at a
After the Italo-Turkish War (1911-1912), Italy established the two colonies of
**Italian Tripolitania** and **Cyrenaica**, which merged into **Italian Libya** in 1934.
They all used the flag of Italy.
Tripolitanian Republic (Arabic: الجمهورية الطرابلسية‎, al-Jumhuriyat at-Trabulsiya), was an
Arab republic that declared the independence of Tripolitania from Italian Libya after World War I.

libya-ottoman.subtitle: Tripoli
desc:
The coastal region of what is today **Libya** was ruled by the Ottoman Empire 
- from 1551 to 1864, as the Eyalet of Tripolitania (Ottoman Turkish: ایالت طرابلس غرب‎ Eyālet-i Trâblus Gârb)
- from 1864 to 1912, as the Vilayet of Tripolitania (Ottoman Turkish: ولايت طرابلس غرب‎ Vilâyet-i Trâblus Gârb)
